Name: American Great Lakes
About: accounts for 21 % of  Earth’s surface fresh water

Name: Antartic Ice Shelf
About: holds 90 % of Earth’s surface fresh water

Name: Lake Baikal
About: holds 20 % of Earth’s unfrozen surface fresh water

Name: Lake Victoria
About: second largest freshwater lake by surface area

Name: Lake Tanganyika
Location: Burundi, Zambia, Tanzania, and the Democratic Republic of Congo
About: second largest volume fresh water lake
